== Description ==

NatureSpace is an easily customizable WordPress multipurpose theme. It is a minimalistic, fully responsive and Retina ready theme that allows for easy viewing on any device.

== Installation ==

You can install this theme through the WordPress themes installer under "Appearance > Themes - Add New" by uploading the ZIP folder that you have got after purchasing the NatureSpace Premium theme.
Alternatively, you can download the file, unzip it and move the extracted content via FTP to the "wp-content/themes" folder of your WordPress installation. Then, you will be able to activate the theme.

== Documentation ==

The complete documentation of NatureSpace names "documentation.html" and is located in "docs" folder. It is also accessable via Theme Options Panel after installing and activating this theme.
